Name: the Tortuga Dominion
Description: Originally the 237th Light Cavalry Regiment of House Davion, the unit deserted from the Star League Defense Force during the Reunification War and the survivors escaped to the Periphery were they found and colonized several worlds, while turning to piracy to survive. The Dominion is ruled by the Council of the Damned, consisting of the larger pirate bands and its current bandit queen is 'Lady Death' Paula Trevaline, the leader of the Death's Consorts.
ReputationStatements: Lad, don't bring a knife to a 'Mech fight, stick it instead on the pilot while they're drunk at the tavern.

MissionSuccessStatements: Aye, you did pretty good didn't you. Just don't expect much of a bonus if you want to live this place alive.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Agh, if only that last lance hadn't appeared. Still, you couldn't have done better, I guess.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Say again? I've seen a lot of pirates and mercenaries, and in you I just found a new category for them: hopeless.
